page.title: 16Farming (Page 2)
page.content:
Treskillard Cottage ____________________ This is a 2 bedroomed cottage with 1/4 acre of land.They have 2 goats and 1 rabbit. The people enjoy squash,badminton,gardening,cooking, knitting,piano playing,judo and swimming.
Wheal Buller Farm __________________ The farm has 9 animals.They have 3 pigs,2 cows,1 bull and 3 calves.They also have 2 dogs and 1 cat.They grow potatoes,carrots,peas,onions,radish, hay,beans and straw.They have a milking machine and a cattle box.They make butter,cream,yoghurt and ice-cream with their milk.The farm house is very old.The farmer would like to have been a mining engineer.
